item.title: EKC 16.6 CHRISTMAS EDITION HAS BEEN PUSHED TO YOU ALL. PYRAMID HAS BEEN ADDED UNDER TV SHOWS AND MOVIES. PYRAMID WORKS VERY WELL. TRY IT OUT!!! ANOTHER WAY TO GET MOVIES AND SHOWS RIGHT NOW, IS TO CHECK OUT THE APK SYSTEM. CLICK ON APK AND INSTALL TERRARIUM. FOLLOW THE PROMPTS AFTER YOU CLICK. AFTER EACH IS INSTALLED IT CAN BE LAUNCHED FROM WITHIN EKC FOR SIMPLICITY. CLICK ON YOU DESIRED APK IN THE APK SUB MENU BY CLICKING DOWN WHEN APK IS HIGHLIGHTED.-

RAFFLE IS NOW LIVE FOR THE NEW EKC LOADED FIRETV. RAFFLE TICKETS CAN BE BOUGHT FOR $5 A TICKET. WHEN BOUGHT ILL SEND YOU AN EMAIL WITH A TICKET ON IT SO YOU CAN PRINT IT OUT AND THROW INTO A STOCKING OR GIFT. BUY TICKETS AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/SHOP. THE NEW EKC FIRE TV IS IN STOCK AND AVAILABLE NOW FOR $159.95. HEAD OVER TO ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM AND GET ONE TODAY! DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

PLAYERS KLUB SIGN UP SITE IS ACTIVE AGAIN. COST IS $5 A MONTH AND YOU GET GREAT LIVE TV. SIGN UP AT BIT.LY/PLAYERSIPTV-AFTER YOU MAKE AN ACCOUNT SIMPLY ENTER IN YOUR LOG IN INFO UNDER LIVE TV IN THE PK LOG IN SECTION
